name: MirrOOr
description:
Controll the 2 Dots with your cursor.

Use Turbo by holding the LMB.

Puck up health and mind the rockets and traps.

Collect health and beat your friends high score.

The game was made for the Monthly Game Jam in Budapest (HEJ).

My personal challange for the month was to learn to use the PlayFab online leaderboard.
